mapper.insert: INSERT INTO monitoring_log (api_id, status_code, response_time, checked_at) VALUES (#{apiId}, #{statusCode}, #{responseTime}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT ml.id, ml.api_id, ma.name AS api_name, ma.url AS api_url, ml.status_code, ml.response_time, ml.checked_at FROM monitoring_log ml JOIN monitored_api ma ON ml.api_id = ma.id WHERE ml.api_id = #{apiId} ORDER BY ml.checked_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT * FROM monitoring_log WHERE api_id = #{apiId} AND checked_at BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY checked_at DESC;
